MTHFR.title: MTHFR
MTHFR.description: Affects folate and homocysteine metabolism. Variants may cause fatigue, impaired recovery, and impact ATP production, cardiovascular health, digestion, and cell repair.

areas.energy: Important for cellular energy production and mitochondrial function. Variants may cause fatigue and impaired recovery.
areas.cardioFitness: Affects folate and homocysteine metabolism, linked to cardiovascular health and blood vessel function.
areas.strength: Contributes to cell repair and recovery after strength training. Folate deficiency can impair muscle growth.
areas.digestiveHealth: Affects nutrient absorption and detoxification in the gut. Variants may cause digestive issues.

PGC1A.title: PGC-1α (PPARGC1A)
PGC1A.description: Master regulator of mitochondrial biogenesis, muscle growth, and endurance. Variants affect VO₂ max, training response, and recovery.

areas.energy: Regulates mitochondrial biogenesis and increases cellular energy capacity.
areas.cardioFitness: Affects VO₂ max and endurance during cardio training.
areas.strength: Contributes to muscle growth and recovery after strength training.

SIRT1_SIRT3.title: SIRT1/SIRT3
SIRT1_SIRT3.description: Regulate mitochondrial function, fat burning, and cellular stress response. Affect aging and energy levels.

areas.energy: Regulate mitochondrial function and fat burning. Affect energy levels and aging.

NRF1_NRF2.title: NRF1/NRF2
NRF1_NRF2.description: Control genes for mitochondrial respiratory chain and antioxidant defense.

areas.energy: Control genes for mitochondrial respiratory chain and antioxidant defense.

UCP2_UCP3.title: UCP2/UCP3
UCP2_UCP3.description: Affect energy expenditure and heat production in mitochondria.

areas.energy: Affect energy expenditure and heat production in mitochondria.

MT_ND1_MT_CO1.title: MT-ND1, MT-CO1 (mtDNA)
MT_ND1_MT_CO1.description: Mitochondrial DNA encodes key parts of the respiratory chain. Mutations can reduce energy production.

areas.energy: Mitochondrial DNA encodes key parts of the respiratory chain. Mutations can reduce energy production.

ACE.title: ACE (Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme)
ACE.description: Affects blood pressure and oxygen uptake. Some variants are linked to better endurance or explosive strength.

areas.cardioFitness: Affects blood pressure and oxygen uptake. Some variants are linked to better endurance.
areas.strength: May affect explosive strength and recovery in strength training.

ACTN3.title: ACTN3
ACTN3.description: Fast muscle protein. Some variants favor explosive strength, others endurance. Influences training response and muscle fiber distribution.

areas.cardioFitness: Affects muscle type and training response in cardio training.
areas.strength: Some variants favor explosive strength, others endurance. Influences muscle fiber distribution.

NOS3.title: NOS3
NOS3.description: Regulates nitric oxide production and blood vessel dilation. Affects blood flow and oxygenation during exercise.

areas.cardioFitness: Regulates nitric oxide production and blood vessel dilation. Affects blood flow during exercise.

ADRB2.title: ADRB2
ADRB2.description: Affects heart's response to adrenaline, pulse, and oxygen transport during exertion.

areas.cardioFitness: Affects heart's response to adrenaline, pulse, and oxygen transport during exertion.

MSTN.title: MSTN (Myostatin)
MSTN.description: Regulates muscle growth. Mutations can increase muscle mass and strength.

areas.strength: Regulates muscle growth. Mutations can increase muscle mass and strength.

IGF1.title: IGF1
IGF1.description: Affects muscle building and recovery. Variants can result in different training responses.

areas.strength: Affects muscle building and recovery. Variants can result in different training responses.

FUT2.title: FUT2
FUT2.description: Affects gut flora composition and prebiotic production. Some variants increase risk of digestive issues.

areas.digestiveHealth: Affects gut flora composition and prebiotic production. Some variants increase risk of digestive issues.

LCT.title: LCT (Lactase)
LCT.description: Controls ability to break down lactose (milk sugar). Lactose intolerance is due to variants in this gene.

areas.digestiveHealth: Controls ability to break down lactose (milk sugar). Lactose intolerance is due to variants in this gene.

HLA_DQ2_DQ8.title: HLA-DQ2/DQ8
HLA_DQ2_DQ8.description: Associated with gluten intolerance (celiac disease). Presence increases risk of autoimmune reaction to gluten.

areas.digestiveHealth: Associated with gluten intolerance (celiac disease). Presence increases risk of autoimmune reaction to gluten.

MUC2.title: MUC2
MUC2.description: Encodes mucin, a protein protecting the gut wall. Variants can affect mucosal protection against inflammation.

areas.digestiveHealth: Encodes mucin, a protein protecting the gut wall. Variants can affect mucosal protection against inflammation.

ALDH2.title: ALDH2
ALDH2.description: Affects alcohol breakdown. Some variants increase sensitivity to alcohol and digestive discomfort.

areas.digestiveHealth: Affects alcohol breakdown. Some variants increase sensitivity to alcohol and digestive discomfort.
